document_data.name: Zalaznar Crinios
document_data.race: [[Treant]]{{Cite dragon/362/Countdown to the Realms: Spellplague: The Wailing Years}}, [[Human]] (formerly)
document_data.mainbody: '''Zalaznar Crinios''' was the ruler of [[Cedarsproke]] in the [[Gulthmere Forest]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Zalaznar was a totally independent leader, not affiliated with the [[Emerald Enclave]]. He sometimes disagreed with the Enclave's politics but remained neutral instead, showing dissent without weakening the religion.
document_data.History: In [[1391 DR]] Zalaznar was transformed into a mighty [[treant]] for his service to nature, taking hold of the druid circle in [[Cedarspoke]].
